params.name: ingestURL
params.desc: The data source URL for the download

params.name: sourceName
params.desc: The name of the data source

params.name: topElement
params.desc: The XML element under which the records are contained

params.name: documentElement
params.desc: The XML element of the record

params.name: useCache
params.desc: If set true and cached data exists from previous ingestion that will be used

params.name: allowedSetSpecs
params.desc: Comma separated list of set spec names
